Detailed Description

A dockable collection of interface panes.

The dockable tabbed pane that is used to organize panes in the DAZ Studio interface.

Hides all panes without changing their group ownership.

void DzPaneGroup::hidePane ( DzPane *  pane  )  [slot]

Hides the given pane without changing its group ownership.

Parameters:
The pane to be hidden
void DzPaneGroup::hideTabBar ( bool  hide  )  [slot]

Sets whether this pane group's tab bar is hidden or not. Emits DzPane::tabBarHiddenChanged(). When the tab bar is hidden, the options menu for the current pane is not visible. If desired, DzPane instances should connect to it's DzPane::tabBarHiddenChanged() signal to be able to provide an alternate options menu when the tab bar is hidden.

Parameters:
hide If true, hides the tab bar, otherwise makes it visible
int DzPaneGroup::insertPane ( DzPane *  pane,
int  index = -1 
)

Called by the framework to add the given pane to this pane group. Returns the index that the pane occupies, or -1 on error.

Parameters:
pane The pane to be inserted
index Where to insert the pane in the group

Returns:
true if auto-hide is turned on for this pane group, otherwise, false.

Called by the framework to remove the given pane to this pane group. Returns the index that the pane occupied, or -1 on error.
